name: Galahad Mental Frame
description: The Galahad frame represents the pinnacle of Knights Manufacturing's psycho-neural interface technology. It doesn't merely connect to a pilot's mind; it merges with it, fostering a symbiotic relationship where the line between machine and pilot blurs.

core_system.name: Relic system - Armour up
core_system.active_effect:
On activation the pilot initiates a full psycho-neural sync with the Galahad's onboard NHP. This creates a temporary state of unified consciousness, merging the pilot's tactical acumen with the NHP's lightning-fast reflexes and combat instincts.
Activating the core system will generate 2 heat,
For RP purposes, please add +1 to your custom counter laballed - mental state
core_system.description:
By merging consciousness with the onboard AI, the pilot unlocks a state of perfect synchronicity, granting the mech unparalleled combat prowess, heightened sensory awareness, and unmatched agility. However, this profound connection leaves a lingering toll on the pilot's mind, requiring both physical and mental recovery, Activating the core system will generate 2 heat,
For RP purposes, please add +1 to your custom counter laballed - mental state.
